SourceText: Module name: @results.name
text: 课程名称：@results.name
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Before we begin the ParentText programme, we must learn to slow down. 💚
text: 开始之前，我们先学习如何放慢节奏。💚

SourceText: Slowing down will help you manage stress and be more able to take care of others and yourself.🌱
text:
你会不会有时觉得很生气或疲惫？任何人都难免遇到生活压力。

放慢节奏可以帮你解压，从而更好地照顾自己，和他人。🌱

SourceText: Let's practice slowing down together.
text: 让我们一起来放慢节奏吧！

SourceText: Click 🔗 to read the comic
text: 点击查看漫画（先看漫画，再点下一步😎）

SourceText: You’ve completed 50% of this skill! Press NEXT to continue.
text: 你已经完成了50%！点击“下一步”继续学习。

SourceText: Let’s slow down, together. ▶️Press Play
text: 视频跟练。

SourceText: ⏯ Click to watch the video
text: ⏯ 点击观看视频（先看视频，再点下一步😎）

SourceText: Well done! You have learnt how to slow down!
text: 太棒了！你已经学会了如何放慢节奏！

SourceText: Try slowing down whenever you feel angry, overwhelmed, stressed or worried. ⏰ Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also slow down with @fields.child_nickname!
text: 当你感觉生气、担心、焦虑或者压力很大的时候，就闭上眼睛，深呼吸几次⏰ 你还可以和 @fields.child_nickname 一起试试！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Try slowing down whenever you feel angry, overwhelmed, stressed or worried. ⏰ Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also slow down with your child!
text: 当你感觉生气、担心、焦虑或者压力很大的时候，就闭上眼睛，深呼吸几次⏰ 你还可以和孩子一起试试！

SourceText: This skill is about how you and your partner, or other family members such as your child’s grandparents, can treat each other as equals. ⭐ Family and friends might tell you how a partner, a parent, or a grandparent should act. But men, women, and grandparents all benefit when they talk to each other and make decisions together.
text:
如何减少与家人之间的矛盾，与家人平等相待？

⭐ 你可以试试，平时在做决定时，多问问家人的意见

SourceText: For example, next time a decision needs to be made, involve your partner and other family members who take care of your child and ask what they think.
text: 家人之间相互交流，共同做决定，对全家都有好处！

SourceText: Treating each other as equals and making decisions together can have a big impact on how we feel and can help our children feel loved and safe. ⭐
text: 平等对待彼此，一起做决定，这样的家庭氛围能使孩子感到被爱和安心。⭐

SourceText: Let’s do a True/False quiz!
text: 判断题

SourceText: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship between family members should only be made by one person.
text: 有些重要决定会影响到整个家庭，应该由一个人来做。

SourceText: Incorrect. When making big decisions that impact the whole family or relationship, it is important for family members to practise making decisions together.
text:
❌ 不对哦。

做出重大决定时，家庭成员共同决策非常重要。

SourceText: You are right! Communicating and making big decisions together with our partner and other family members is an important part of having a healthy relationship. 🔑
text:
答对啦！🎈 

做出重大决定时，家庭成员共同决策非常重要。🔑

SourceText: Sorry, I dont' understand what you mean.
text: 抱歉，我不明白你的意思。

SourceText: You’ve completed 25% of this skill! Press NEXT to continue.
text: 你已经完成了25%！点击“下一步”继续学习。

SourceText: Here is a comic that shows how family members can treat each other as equals and make decisions together:
text: 看看漫画里的家长是怎样平等相待、共同决策的：

SourceText: Here’s a video message about treating each other as equals.
text: 以下视频，介绍了如何与家人平等相待。

SourceText: Here’s a audio message about treating each other as equals.
text: 这是一个关于平等相待的音频。

SourceText: Here are some simple steps that you and your family members can do to treat each other as equals:
1️⃣ *SHARE DECISION MAKING*
text: 1️⃣ *共同做决定*

SourceText: 💡 Next time you are making a decision, try involving your partner or other family members.
text: 💡 下次做决定时，试着拉上你的伴侣或其他家庭成员哦。

SourceText: 😃 Ask what they think.
text: 😃 询问他们的想法。

SourceText: 2️⃣ *INVOLVE YOUR PARTNER*
text: 2️⃣ *问问家人的看法*

SourceText: 😣 It can sometimes be hard to remember to involve our partners or other family members in decision making.
text: 😣有时候很难想起要让伴侣或其他家庭成员一起参与决策。

SourceText: 🔄 If you forget, keep trying!
text: 🔄 如果你之前忘了，没关系，下次再试一试！

SourceText: ⭐ Asking for their opinion shows that you care and want them to be involved.
text: ⭐ 征求他们的意见，会让他们感受到你在乎他们并希望他们参与进来。

SourceText: 3️⃣ *TIMING MAKES A DIFFERENCE*
text: 3️⃣ *时机很重要*

SourceText: ⏰ If you have a decision to make, bring it up during a time when you and your family members are not too busy, such as early in the morning or later in the evening.
text: ⏰ 如果你想商量一件事情，最好在你和家人都比较闲的时候提出来，比如饭前饭后。

SourceText: 4️⃣ *PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT*
text: 4️⃣ *熟能生巧*

SourceText: ⏰ It can take time to get used to making decisions together.
text: ⏰让共同决策成为习惯，这是需要时间的。

SourceText: 🔄 Give yourself time and keep trying!
text: 🔄 给自己点时间，继续努力！

SourceText: 😃 Remember that by communicating with your family members, you will both eventually start to feel more comfortable talking and sharing decisions.
text: 😃 请记住，如果你能多与家人沟通，那么渐渐地大家会越来越懂得如何相互交流、共同决策。

SourceText: You’ve completed 75% of this skill! Press NEXT to continue.
text: 你已经完成了75%！点击“下一步”继续学习。

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ Your home activity is to involve your partner or other family members in a decision you are making today. Can you do it?  ⏰
text:
家庭练习！⭐ 

和家人共同商量决定一件家庭事务。

你今天有时间试一试吗？⏰

SourceText: Well done! Communicating and working together with your family members makes a difference! 🎉
text: 太好了！积极与家人沟通和合作，会让家庭更加和睦！🎉

SourceText: It can take time to get used to making decisions together. Give yourself time to adjust. Remember that by communicating with your family members and involving them in decision-making, they will start to feel more comfortable doing so too. ⭐ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
text: 没关系！你可以在准备好后再开始。如果能多与家人沟通，大家会越来越懂得如何交流、共同决策。⭐

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: 抱歉，我不明白你的意思。

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the first step to having a healthy relationship with your partner and other family members! You are one step closer towards your goal of “Have a Healthy Relationship with my Family Members” 🎉
text: 太好了，你已经迈出了与伴侣和家庭成员建立健康关系的第一步！你离达成“构建健康家庭关系”的目标又近了一步。 🎉

SourceText: This skill is about becoming a confident and supportive family member as a parent. 💚
text: 如何成为更自信的家长，更好地为家人提供支持呢？快来学学今天的课程吧！💚

SourceText: When mothers and fathers are both engaged in parenting their children, everyone benefits, including the children. 😃
text: 家长之间的合作和支持能促进孩子的健康成长，增进家人之间的沟通和理解。😃

SourceText: It is only the role of the mother and not the father to parent a child.💚
text: 育儿只是母亲的职责，跟父亲没关系。💚

SourceText: Incorrect. Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part too! When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their children everyone benefits! 🌷
text:
❌ 不对哦。

父亲在育儿中也扮演着重要角色！！

父母双方都积极育儿，对孩子特别有好处🌷

SourceText: You are right! Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part too! When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their children everyone benefits! 🌷
text:
✨ 答对了！

父亲在育儿中也扮演着重要角色！

父母双方都积极育儿，对孩子特别有好处🌷

SourceText: Here is a comic that shows how you can be a supportive family member and involved parent:
text: 来看看漫画中的家长，是如何共同育儿的？

SourceText: Here’s a video message about being a supportive family member and parent.
text: 漫画里的对话有哪些亮点？以下为你总结出4️⃣个技巧，帮你与家人相互支持，共同育儿！

SourceText: Here’s a audio message about being a supportive family member and parent.
text: 以下是一段关于如何更好地支持家人，并参与育儿的音频。

SourceText: Here are some simple ways you can become a more confident and supportive family member AND parent.
text: 漫画里的对话有哪些亮点？以下为你总结出4️⃣个技巧，帮你与家人相互支持，共同育儿！

SourceText: 1️⃣ *SHOW APPRECIATION*
text: 1️⃣ *表达感谢*

SourceText: ⚽ Show your partner that you appreciate it when they spend quality time with your children.
text: ⚽告诉你的家人，你很感谢他们与孩子共度高质量亲子时光。

SourceText: 2️⃣ *WORK TOGETHER*
text: 2️⃣ *一起努力*

SourceText: 😃 Unsure how to work together with your partner? Ask them!
text: 😃 不知道如何与你的家人协作？问问他们的意见吧！

SourceText: ✅ By asking, you show that you care and want to be involved!
text: ✅ 询问他们的意见，能表明你在意，并希望与他们协作！

SourceText: 3️⃣ *LEND A HAND*
text: 3️⃣ *提供支持*

SourceText: 👋It can sometimes be difficult to remember to ask your partner if they need help.
text: 👋有时候很难想起去问一问家人是否需要支持。

SourceText: 💡 Once you start asking, they may realise you want to be more involved and begin asking for your help on their own.
text: 💡 一旦你开口，他们可能就会意识到你想要参与，并逐渐开始主动寻求你的支持。

SourceText: 4️⃣ *ASK FOR HELP*
text: 4️⃣ *寻求支持*

SourceText: 😒 It can be hard to ask for help. Sometimes we expect our partners to know we need help even if we don’t ask them.
text: 😒 主动寻求支持可能有点难为情。有时，我们会希望即使我们没有开口，家人也能知道我们需要支持。

SourceText: ⭐Once you start asking, they will likely start offering to help more in the future!
text: ⭐一旦你开口了，他们将来很可能会主动为你提供更多支持！

SourceText: 💚 Remember to thank your partner!
text: 💚 别忘了感谢你的家人哦！

SourceText: Home activity! ⭐ Try doing childcare or housework together with your partner. Do you have time to do it today?
text: 家庭练习！⭐ 试着与家人一起照顾孩子或做家务。

SourceText: Fantastic! 🎉
text: 太棒啦！🎉和家人一起照顾孩子和做家务，能让彼此感到是可以互相支持、相互依靠的。

SourceText: Sometimes it can be hard to find time during the day. Can you think of a time when you’re less busy? For example, maybe it is easier to do housework together later in the evening when some of the children have gone to sleep. Try to see what works for you! ⭐ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
text: 没关系，可以等没那么忙的时候，比如晚上孩子睡着的时候，一起做家务。❤️多试试，渐渐地就能找到适合的时间和方式！⭐

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the second step to having a healthy relationship with your family member! You are one step closer towards your goal of “Have a Healthy Relationship with my family member” 🎉
text: 做得很好！你已经完成了与家庭成员建立健康关系的第二步！你离“构建健康家庭关系”的目标又近了一步。 🎉

SourceText: This skill is about sharing family responsibilities between you and your family members. 👋
text:
一个人带孩子、做家务会不会感到有点累？

其实，家人应该共同分担家庭责任。

SourceText: Sharing family responsibilities with your family members can help make life less stressful and improve your relationship! 💚
text: 与家人共担责任，有助于减轻生活压力，让感情升温！💚

SourceText: Sharing family responsibilities is not important as long as the housework gets done.
text: 分担家庭责任并不重要，只要把家务做完就行。

SourceText: Incorrect. Sharing the workload is important to make sure things are equal and benefits the whole family! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. This also lets you talk to your family members  about how to share the workload.
text:
❌ 不对哦。

共担责任有利于家人间平等相待，对全家都有好处

比如，你们可以围绕带孩子和做家务进行分工。

SourceText: You are right! Sharing the workload is important to make sure things are equal and benefits the whole family! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. This also lets you talk to your family members about how to share the workload.
text:
✨ 答对了！

共担责任有利于家人间平等相待，对全家都有好处。

比如，你们可以围绕带孩子和做家务进行分工。

SourceText: Here is a comic that shows how you can share family responsibilities.
text: 漫画里的一家人是怎么共同分担家庭责任的？

SourceText: Here’s a video message about sharing family responsibilities.
text: 漫画里的爸爸获得了妻子和女儿的支持。那该如何获得来自家人们的支持呢？试试以下3️⃣点吧。

SourceText: Here’s a audio message about sharing family responsibilities.
text: 这是一段关于共同分担家庭责任的音频。

SourceText: Here are some simple ways you can start sharing family responsibilities with your partner
text: 漫画里的爸爸获得了妻子和女儿的支持。那该如何获得来自家人们的支持呢？试试以下3️⃣点吧。

SourceText: 1️⃣ *CREATE A ROUTINE!*
text: 1️⃣ *安排日常分工！*

SourceText: ⏰ This can be hard to remember! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful.
text: ⏰ 虽然我们常常忽视了这一点，但是围绕育儿和做家务，建立起一个日常分工是很重要的。

SourceText: 😃 This also lets you talk to your family members about how to share the workload.
text: 😃 也可以借此和家人讨论如何分担家庭责任。

SourceText: 2️⃣ *TALK ABOUT THE WORKLOAD WITH YOUR PARTNER*
text: 2️⃣ *和家人讨论如何分担*

SourceText: 😃 Talking with your family members about how you can share family responsibilities helps both of you understand each other better.
text: 😃 与家人讨论如何分担家庭责任可以帮助你们更好地相互理解。

SourceText: 💛 It also shows that you care!
text: 💛 这也表明你很在意家人的感受！

SourceText: 3️⃣ *ASK FOR HELP*
text: 3️⃣ *寻求支持*

SourceText: 😒 It can be hard to remember to ask for help.
text: 😒 我们常常忘记去寻求支持。

SourceText: 🌷 Be kind to yourself if you forget to ask and try again another time.
text: 🌷 如果你忘了，没关系的，下次再试试。

SourceText: ⭐ Asking for help and sharing family responsibilities benefits the whole family!
text: ⭐ 寻求支持、共同分担家庭责任对整个家庭都有好处！

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ Invite your family members to discuss how you can share family responsibilities more evenly at home! Do you have time to do it today?
text:
家庭练习！ ⭐

和家人一起讨论，如何更好地分担家庭责任！

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: Excellent job! Sharing the workload benefits the whole family. You are a star! 🎉
text: 做得很好！共同分担家庭责任，会让彼此感到是可以相互依靠、平等相待的。 🎉 🎉

SourceText: Trying something new can be hard! To make it easier, ask your family members if you can do housework tasks the first few times. Soon you’ll feel more confident doing it on your own! ⭐ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
text:
万事开头难，慢慢来吧。

改变可以从一点一滴的小事开始。

比如，如果平时你做家务比较多，今天不妨试试请家人来帮忙。

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the third step to having a healthy relationship with your family members! You are one step closer towards your goal of “Have a Healthy Relationship with my family members” 🎉
text: 非常好，你已经完成了与家庭成员建立健康关系的第三步！你离“构建健康家庭关系”的目标又近了一步。 🎉

SourceText: This skill is about resolving conflict peacefully between you and your partner, as well as other family members such as your child’s grandparents. 💚
text: 每个家庭都会有矛盾和冲突，关键在于如何和平解决💚

SourceText: All adults have disagreements sometimes. But fighting is not an effective way to solve issues. Learning to respond in a calmer way when experiencing disagreements with your family members can help you create a more peaceful home.🌷
text: 有分歧很正常，但争吵不是解决问题的好方法。用更冷静的方式处理分歧，可以让家庭更和睦。🌷

SourceText: When facing a disagreement, taking a pause before responding can help us stay calm and respond better.
text: 面对分歧时，冷静一下再做出回应，可以让我们心平气和，然后更好地解决问题。

SourceText: That’s correct! It can be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others. So taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us to respond better.
text:
✨ 答对了！

发生分歧时，很难心平气和。

先冷静一下，深呼吸几次，可以帮我们更好地作出回应。

SourceText: That’s incorrect. Since it can be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others, taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us to respond better.
text:
❌ 不对哦。

发生分歧时，很难心平气和。

先冷静一下，深呼吸几次，可以帮我们更好地作出回应。

SourceText: Here is a comic that shows how you can resolve conflict peacefully.
text: 下大雨了，衣服却没收，家庭矛盾一触即发，看看他们是怎么解决的？。

SourceText: Here’s a video message about resolving conflicts peacefully.
text:
下大雨了，衣服却没收，家庭矛盾一触即发，看看他们是怎么解决的？

面对家庭矛盾时，你也可以试试这3️⃣个方法，来避免冲突升级。

SourceText: Here’s a audio message about resolving conflicts peacefully.
text: 以下是一段关于和平解决冲突的音频。

SourceText: Here are some tips you can try to resolve conflicts with your family members in a peaceful way.
text:
想一想，刚才漫画里的家人是如何在关键时刻，和平化解矛盾的？

面对家庭矛盾时，你也可以试试这3️⃣个方法，来避免冲突升级。

SourceText: 1️⃣ *COUNT TO 10*
😣 It can sometimes be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others.
text: 😣当与他人发生分歧时，有时真的很难保持冷静。

SourceText: 🔟 Try to think of something that you can do that might help, like taking a couple deep breaths or counting to ten.
text: 试着做一些能帮你冷静下来的事情，比如深呼吸几次，或数到🔟 。

SourceText: 2️⃣ *SLOW DOWN*
text: 2️⃣ *放慢节奏*

SourceText: ⏸ On the first day of ParentText, you learned to close your eyes, breathe deep, and slow down.
text: ⏸ 在学习“科育时光”的第一天，你学习了如何放慢节奏，比如闭上眼睛，深呼吸。

SourceText: 😃 Slow down before responding can help us stay calm and respond better a little later.
text: 😃 在回应之前试着放慢节奏，这有助于帮我们保持冷静，以便之后更好地做出回应。

SourceText: 🌷 When you feel yourself getting angry, try slowing down. You can do this!
text: 🌷 当你觉得快要生气的时候，试着放慢节奏。你可以的！

SourceText: 3️⃣ *WALK AWAY IF NECESSARY*
text: 3️⃣ *需要的话，可以先走开一下*

SourceText: 😣 Sometimes others respond to us negatively when we’re having a disagreement.
text: 😣 面对分歧时，别人有时会对我们做出消极的事情。

SourceText: ❗ In these situations, especially if you feel fearful or threatened, it may be best to walk away for a bit until everyone has calmed down.
text: ❗ 在这种情况下，尤其是当你感到恐惧或受到威胁时，最好先离开一会儿，等大家都冷静下来再说。

SourceText: Remember, if you need help in a crisis, you can type {HELP} in ParentText to receive a list of community resources where you may find support.
text: 记住，如果你遇到危险需要帮助，你可以输入 {HELP} ， 获取相关支持。

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ Today’s home activity is to practise slowing down. Do you have time to practise slowing down today?
text:
家庭练习！ ⭐ 

当你感到生气、沮丧等负面情绪时，试着放慢节奏。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: Good job! Slowing down and staying calm is a great way to reduce conflicts.
text: 太棒了！放慢节奏，保持冷静，是减少冲突的好方法。

SourceText: It can be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others. Try to think of something that you can do that might help like taking a couple deep breaths. Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
text: 发生分歧时，很难保持心平气和。试着做一些能帮你冷静下来的事情，比如深呼吸几次，或数到🔟 。

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the fourth step to having a healthy relationship with your partner! You are one step closer towards your goal of “Have a Healthy Relationship with my family members” 🎉
text: 太好了，你已经完成了与家庭成员建立健康关系的第四步！你离“构建健康家庭关系”的目标又近了一步。 🎉

SourceText: This skill is about how you and your partner, as well as other family members such as your child’’s grandparents, can listen and talk to each other in a positive way. 💙
text: 家人之间，应该如何积极地相互倾听和交流？ 💙

SourceText: Listening and talking to those around us are key to a more peaceful home. 👂
text: 倾听和交流是促进家庭和睦的关键。👂

SourceText: Talking to your family members about issues before they become bigger problems can help avoid arguments from building up. 💛
text: 及时沟通可以防止家庭问题升级，避免冲突加剧。 💛

SourceText: Talking to and listening to your family members can help prevent conflict
text: 多与家人交流，倾听他们的意见，有助于预防冲突。

SourceText: That’s correct! Sharing how we feel and talking about difficulties we’re facing makes the family more united and harmonious! When you listen and talk to your family members you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
text:
✨ 答对了！

多与家人分享感受、讨论问题，可以改善家庭关系。

积极倾听和沟通能促使家人相互支持，减少冲突。

SourceText: That’s incorrect. Sharing how we feel and talking about difficulties we’re facing makes the family more united and harmonious! When you listen and talk to your family members you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
text:
❌ 不对哦。

多与家人分享感受、讨论问题，可以改善家庭关系。

积极倾听和沟通能促使家人相互支持，减少冲突。

SourceText: Here is a comic that shows how family members can listen and talk to each other in a supportive and loving way.
text: 积极的倾听和交流究竟是什么样的？

SourceText: Here’s a video message about listening and talking to each other.
text: 怎样才能改善家庭内部的倾听和沟通？这里有4️⃣ 个小技巧哦。

SourceText: Here’s a audio message about listening and talking to each other.
text: 以下是一段关于彼此倾听和沟通的音频。

SourceText: Here are some tips on how you and your partner can listen and talk with each other in a supportive and loving way:
text: 怎样才能改善家庭内部的倾听和沟通？这里有4️⃣ 个小技巧哦：

SourceText: 1️⃣ *SHARE HOW YOU FEEL*
text: 1️⃣ *分享你的感受*

SourceText: 🏆 Sharing how we feel and talking about the difficulties we’re facing is a sign of strength and can make the family more united and harmonious!
text: 🏆 谈论困难是需要勇气的，可以促进家庭团结和谐。

SourceText: 💚 By sharing emotions you can better understand and support each other.
text: 💚 分享彼此的感受，可以更好地理解和支持彼此。

SourceText: 2️⃣ *YOU CHOOSE WHAT YOU SHARE*
text: 2️⃣ *自主决定分享内容*

SourceText: 😃 Sharing your challenges with your family members is about making them more aware of how you are feeling.
text: 😃 主动谈论你正面临的一些挑战，可以让家人更好理解你当下的感受。

SourceText: ⭐ Remember, you decide how much you share. You can always choose to share more at a later time.
text: ⭐ 你可以自己决定要跟家人说哪些事、说到什么程度。

SourceText: 3️⃣ *BE KIND TO YOURSELF*
text: 3️⃣ *善待自己*

SourceText: 😣 Starting something new can be difficult.
text: 😣 主动分享个人感受并不容易，万事开头难，别急，慢慢来。

SourceText: ⏰ Give yourself and others time to get used to it.
text: ⏰  给自己和他人一些时间来适应。

SourceText: 4️⃣ *CHOOSE A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL COMFORTABLE*
text: 4️⃣ *选择一个你感觉舒适的时间*

SourceText: 💚 It’s okay if you don't always want to share your emotions.
text: 💚 如果你有时不想分享自己的感受，也没关系的。

SourceText: 🌷 You can choose to share how you’re feeling at a later time once you feel calmer.
text: 🌷 你可以选择等心情平和时，再分享你的感受。

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ Try setting aside some time to talk to your family members about your feelings and any difficulties you’re facing. Do you have time to do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐ 

试着留出一些时间，与家人谈谈你的感受和面临的困难。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: Good for you! Talking about challenges and our emotions can be hard. You are doing great! 🎉
text: 好样的！谈论自己的感受和面临的挑战并不是件容易的事，但是这对建立健康家庭关系来说至关重要。你做得很棒！🎉

SourceText: Talking about our feelings and challenges we’re facing can help others understand and support you better. Emotions and challenges are a part of life, and learning how to handle these, can help make life less stressful. Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
text:
谈论自己的情绪和挑战，能让家人更好地理解和支持你。💛

学会处理情绪和挑战，有助于减轻生活压力。😉

📁

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the fifth step to having a healthy relationship with your family members! 🎉
text: 太棒了，你已经完成了“构建健康家庭关系”的第五步！ 🎉你已经完成了“构建健康家庭关系”目标下面的全部课程！

SourceText: It will also build trust and respect, and support children in learning new things. ✨
text: 并且建立信任，培养孩子的学习能力。✨

SourceText: Let's do a quiz!
text: 判断题！

SourceText: True or False: When I spend special time with my child, I need to have a plan. I need to know what we will do together.
text: 共度亲子时光之前，要先想好该干什么。

SourceText: ❌ That is not correct.
text: ❌ 不对哦。

SourceText: 🧸 You do not have to plan an activity. Your child can lead! Let them choose as long as it is safe. This will increase their confidence and make it more likely that they enjoy their time with you.
text: 🧸 不需要先想好干什么。让孩子来主导，你负责保障安全！这样孩子会更加自信，更加享受。

SourceText: 🎈 You are right!
text: 🎈 答对了！

SourceText: 🧸 Your child can choose the activity as long as it is safe. This will increase their confidence and make it more likely that they enjoy their time with you.
text: 🧸 不需要先想好干什么。让孩子来主导，你负责保障安全！这样孩子会更加自信，更加享受。

SourceText: {F1_DAUGHTER_6} and her mother, {F1_MOTHER}, are playing dress up during one-on-one time. Let’s see how they have fun together:
text: 如何共度亲子时光？看看妈妈{F1_MOTHER}怎么和女儿{F1_DAUGHTER_6}玩换装游戏的吧。

SourceText: That's OK! If you don't have time today, set some time aside tomorrow.
text: 没关系！如果你今天没时间，那就明天再试试。

SourceText: 📺 Switch off the TV, put aside phones, and remove distractions.
text: 📺 关掉电视，放下手机，远离一切让你分心的东西。

SourceText: 👀 Look at @fields.child_nickname. Nod or say “I see” to show you are really paying attention.
text: 👀 注视 @fields.child_nickname，并且积极回应孩子，比如向孩子点点头，或者说“我知道了”，表明你真的在专心听孩子说话。

SourceText: 💛 Accept your child and avoid judgement.
text: 💛 接受孩子的观点和看法，不要进行过多评价。

SourceText: 💡 Respond to your child when they communicate with you. @fields.child_nickname may use gestures, full sentences, movements, and sounds to communicate with you. It shows you are really paying attention to them.
text: 💡 当孩子主动跟你交流时，及时给予回应。 @fields.child_nickname 可能会用手势、言语、动作、声音等等各种方式来表达自己，积极地关注他们的想法吧。

text: 👀 注视孩子，并积极回应他，比如向他点点头，或者说“我知道了”，表明你真的在专心听他说话。

SourceText: 💡 Respond to your child when they communicate with you. Your child may use gestures, full sentences, movements, and sounds to communicate with you. It shows you are really paying attention to them.
text: 💡 当孩子主动跟你交流时，及时给予回应。 你的孩子可能会用手势、言语、动作、声音等等各种方式来表达自己，积极地关注他们的想法吧。

SourceText: 👂Now think about how you talk to yourself when you make a mistake. Is it different?
text: 👂 你平时会用安慰别人的方法，来安慰自己吗？

SourceText: 💛 Often, we don’t treat ourselves as well as we treat our friends and family.
text: 💛 我们对自己，往往没有对家人朋友那么宽容。

SourceText: 🌷Being kind to ourselves helps us deal with hard things. When we are kind to ourselves, we can be kind to others.
text: 🌷 只有先照顾好自己，才能更好地照顾别人。

SourceText: True or False: It is okay to ignore my negative emotions because my feelings don’t really matter if whatever I am doing is for the good of the family.
text: 我可以忽视自己的负面情绪。只要是为了这个家好，我的感受都无关紧要。

SourceText: ❌ That’s incorrect. Your feelings do matter.
text: ❌ 不对哦。

SourceText: 💙 It is important to notice and accept your negative emotions. Then, you will be able to tell yourself it’s OK and be kind to yourself.
text: 💙 你的感受很重要。 告诉自己：没关系的，对自己好点。

SourceText: 🌷 When you are kind to yourself, you will be kind to others, including your family.
text: 🌷 学会善待自己，才能善待孩子和家人。

SourceText: 🎁 That’s correct! Your feelings do matter!
text: 🎁 答对了！

SourceText: {F3_MOTHER} is a single mother of young children. She often feels that between work, parenting, and managing the home, she does not have enough time for her children. She wants to spend more time with {F3_SON_7}, her middle child.
text: {F3_MOTHER}是一个单亲妈妈。她平时很忙，没时间好好陪孩子{F3_SON_7}，怎么办呢？

SourceText: Press Play ▶️ to learn the 3️⃣ three steps of being kind to yourself.
text: 该如何善待自己？只需要3️⃣步：关注自己、谅解自己、善待自己。

SourceText: 3️⃣ Here are three steps to help you be kind to yourself: NOTICE, SAY IT’S OKAY, BE KIND.
text: 该如何善待自己？只需要3️⃣步：关注自己、谅解自己、善待自己。

SourceText: 1️⃣ NOTICE
text: 1️⃣ 关注自己

SourceText: 😣 Sometimes, it seems easier to ignore negative feelings so they will go away.
text: 😔有时候，忽略自己的负面情绪似乎更容易，你觉得这样做它们就会自己消失。

SourceText: ❗But ignoring them only means they will come up later or get worse!
text: ❗但实际上，负面情绪只是被压抑下去了，它们之后还会出现，并且变得更糟！

SourceText: 🚩 When you feel any negative emotion, notice what you are feeling.
text: 🚩所以，当你察觉到任何负面情绪时，一定要关注自己的感受。

SourceText: ⭐ It can be helpful to name this feeling for yourself. For example, after getting all your work done, you can say “I am very tired now”.
text: ⭐试着表达出自己的情绪，例如在完成所有工作后，你可以对自己或别人说：“我现在很累。”

SourceText: 2️⃣ SAY IT’S OK
text: 2️⃣ 谅解自己

SourceText: 🛑 Take a pause or a few deep breaths.
text: 🛑 当出现负面情绪时，停下手中的事，深呼吸几次。

SourceText: 💛 Now, say to yourself, “It’s OK,” because it is OK to have negative feelings. Everyone does sometimes!
text: 💛 然后，你可以对自己说：“没关系的”，因为产生负面情绪是人之常情，每个人都有负面情绪！

SourceText: 😔 Often, these feelings come up for a good reason and can tell us something. It really is OK!
text: 😔 这些情绪的出现通常不是毫无道理的，它们可能在向我们传达什么信号，比如压力过大、缺乏睡眠等等。所以真的没有关系，好好对待自己吧！

SourceText: 3️⃣ BE KIND
text: 3️⃣ 善待自己

SourceText: 💚 When you notice these feelings, it’s important to be kind and patient with yourself.
text: 💚 当你注意到这些情绪时，对自己有点耐心和善意。

SourceText: 🎁 Think about what kind of advice a loving friend or family member might give you now.
text: 🎁 把自己想象成你的好朋友或者亲人，想一想当他们处于你现在的状态时，你会怎样对待他们。

SourceText: Before we finish, let's practise self-care.
text: 在结束之前，来练习一下如何放慢节奏、善待自己吧。

SourceText: Sit down, close your eyes and listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel. When you are ready, open your eyes again.
text: 坐下来，闭上眼睛，慢慢地深呼吸，做3次。

SourceText: Listen to your breath.
text: 慢慢睁开双眼。

SourceText: 😣 Do you sometimes feel your feelings are too much?
text: 😔 你会不会有时候觉得自己思绪很乱？

SourceText: 💚 Talk to someone.
text: 💚 和别人说说你的烦恼。

SourceText: 💙 Talk to someone you trust. Talk to a friend. Talk to family.
text: 💙 找个你信任的人，比如朋友或者家人。

SourceText: 💛 Get your worries off your chest and then let them go. 🌱 Even if it’s just for a moment.
text: 💛 把烦恼说出来，然后把它抛到脑后，哪怕只有一小会儿。🌱

SourceText: ☀️ How do you feel now?
text: ☀️ 做完这些之后，你现在感觉怎么样？

SourceText: ⭐ A joy shared is twice the joy. A problem shared is half the problem.
text: ⭐ 分享快乐就会得到双倍的快乐，诉说烦恼就能减轻一半的烦恼。

SourceText: ⏰ Take a moment to practise taking a pause today.
text: ⏰今天的家庭练习是：找个时间，休息一下。用心体会自己的优点，你就会渐渐变得开朗活泼，感到幸福的。

SourceText: 🏅 The more you practise, the easier it will become.
Can you do it today?
text: 你今天能试试看吗？

SourceText: That’s great! It’s important to practise self care so we are able to deal with hard things that happen.
text: 太好了！学会善待自己是非常重要的，这样我们才能从容应对生活中的各种困难。

SourceText: That’s OK, it can be hard to set aside time for yourself and treat yourself with kindness. 😣
text: 没关系，专门腾出时间关照自己，这确实很不容易。😣

SourceText: 📝 If you feel like you are being hard on yourself, come back to this skill from the Main Menu.
text: 📝 如果之后你感觉自己很累，请不要对自己过于苛刻，试着花点时间，休息一下。你可以随时在主菜单中回顾这些内容。

SourceText: Well done for completing @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Improve my Relationship with My Child. ⭐
text: 真棒！在“建立良好亲子关系”这个目标模块中，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。⭐
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: Remember: Notice, Say it’s OK, and Be kind to yourself. You’re doing so well! ⭐
text:
别忘了：关注自己，谅解自己，善待自己。

SourceText: 🎨 As children get older, they learn to identify lots of other emotions, like feeling excited, frustrated, proud, lonely, peaceful, guilty, or confused.

text:
漫画里的爸妈接下来该怎么做呢？

4️⃣个步骤，帮你引导孩子的价值观。

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are 4 tips to help you instil values in your child that you want them to have: IDENTIFY, TEACH, REPEAT, SHARE.
text:
漫画里的爸妈接下来该怎么做呢？

4️⃣个步骤，帮你引导孩子的价值观：确认、传授、重复、分享。

SourceText: 💡 It’s easiest to start with one value before moving on to others.
3️⃣ REPEAT
text: 3️⃣ 重复

SourceText: 🎉 Praise your child when you see that your child has learnt this value. You should also congratulate yourself. You’re doing so well!
text: 🎉 如果你发现孩子践行了这个价值观，一定要记得表扬孩子。你更应该为自己感到骄傲，因为你的努力获得了回报！

SourceText: 💛 Now, repeat the same process to teach other important values in your home.
text: 💛 然后，你就可以把目标转移到下一个价值观，按照之前的流程，继续引导孩子啦。

SourceText: 4️⃣ SHARE
text: 4️⃣ 分享

SourceText: 👂 Sometimes, listening to other parents share their values and strategies can help you with your child. They will learn from you too!
text: 👂 可以和其他家长交流有关培养孩子价值观的经验，互相分享你们的观点和策略，这样大家都能学到新东西！

SourceText: 🚲 Your child may even make new friends through shared cultural values r!
text: 🚲 孩子也可能因为和别人有相同的价值观而交到新朋友！

SourceText: Excellent! Identifying one value together is the first step. 💙
text: 太好啦！一起找出你们都认可的价值观，是引导孩子价值观的第一步。💙

SourceText: Well done! 🎉
text: 太棒了！🎉

SourceText: You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Improve my Relationship with My Child. 🏆
text: 在“建立良好亲子关系”这个目标模块中，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。🏆
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: In China, cultural values have a strong impact on how we raise our families. ✨
text: 传统价值观很重要。✨

SourceText: Your individual cultural values will influence the values you instil in @fields.child_nickname. 🌱
text: 你个人的价值观念，也会影响到 @fields.child_nickname 。🌱
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your individual cultural values will influence the values you instil in your child. 🌱
text: 你个人的价值观念，也会影响到孩子 。🌱

SourceText: 1️⃣ IDENTIFY
text: 1️⃣ 确认

SourceText: 💡 Identify the most important value you want @fields.child_nickname to have. Ask other caregivers of @fields.child_nickname too!
text: 💡找出你觉得最重要的、最希望 @fields.child_nickname 拥有的价值观。也可以问问 @fields.child_nickname 的其他家长，他们最希望孩子拥有什么价值观。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🔑 Working together helps to identify your shared values. Then, choose one value to start with.
text: 🔑大家一起讨论，确认你们都认可的价值观，然后就可以从中选择一个开始培养啦。

SourceText: 📝 List out ideas for how you want to introduce this value to them.
text: 📝 这个价值观都包括哪些内涵？你们希望怎样帮孩子培养起这个价值观呢？可以把你们的想法都列出来。

SourceText: 💡 Identify the most important value you want your child to have. Ask other caregivers of your child too!
text: 💡找出你觉得最重要的、最希望孩子拥有的价值观。也可以问问孩子的其他家长，他们最希望孩子拥有什么价值观。

SourceText: 2️⃣ TEACH
text: 2️⃣ 传授

SourceText: 📖 Teach the value to @fields.child_nickname or show @fields.child_nickname with examples at home.
text: 📖 言传身教。不仅要用语言把价值观给 @fields.child_nickname 讲明白，还要在日常生活中给 @fields.child_nickname 树立好榜样。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: ⏰ Instilling values in @fields.child_nickname will take time.
text: ⏰ @fields.child_nickname 需要时间来消化、领悟你所传授的价值观。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🎈Remind @fields.child_nickname about it often and praise them!
text: 🎈传授完一个价值观后，要经常提醒 @fields.child_nickname 。如果孩子学会了这个价值观，记得表扬他们！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 📖 Teach the value to your child or show your child with examples at home.
text: 📖 言传身教。不仅要用语言把价值观给孩子讲明白，还要在日常生活中给他们树立好榜样。

SourceText: ⏰ Instilling values in your child will take time.
text: ⏰ 你的孩子需要时间来消化、领悟你所传授的价值观。

SourceText: 🎈Remind your child about it often and praise them!
text: 🎈传授完一个价值观后，还要经常提醒孩子。如果孩子学会了这个价值观，记得表扬他们！

SourceText: Home Activity! Spend some time today with your spouse or another caregiver of @fields.child_nickname to identify the most important value you wish to instil in @fields.child_nickname ⭐ Can you do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐

请和 @fields.child_nickname 的其他家长，一起讨论你们最希望 @fields.child_nickname 拥有的价值观。

今天你有时间试一试吗？⭐
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Home Activity! Spend some time today with your spouse or another caregiver of your child to identify the most important value you wish to instil in your child ⭐ Can you do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐

请和孩子的其他家长，一起讨论你们最希望孩子拥有的价值观。

今天你有时间试一试吗？⭐

SourceText: That’s okay. 💙 When you are spending time with other caregivers of @fields.child_nickname, like while cleaning the house or having supper together, take some time to discuss and identify your most important value for @fields.child_nickname.
text: 没关系。💙 选一个大家都在的时候，比如吃饭的时候，择机和他们讨论，确定你们认为最重要的、最希望 @fields.child_nickname 拥有的价值观。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: That’s okay. 💙 When you are spending time with other caregivers of your child, like while cleaning the house or having supper together, take some time to discuss and identify your most important value for your child.
text: 没关系。💙 选一个大家都在的时候，比如吃饭的时候，择机和他们讨论，确定你们认为最重要的、最希望孩子拥有的价值观。

SourceText: This goal is about preparing your child for success in school by helping them learn.
text: 想提升孩子的学习能力吗？🤩

SourceText: These skills are a guide: use them as your child is ready for them. 💡
text: 一起来看看怎么做吧。💡

SourceText: This first skill is about helping your child learn new words and improve their language skills! 👂
text: 技能1️⃣：帮孩子学新词，提高语言能力！👂

SourceText: Learning to talk and have conversations is important for learning to read and for doing well in school! 🎓
text: 孩子要先学会表达和交谈，之后才能提高阅读和学习能力！🎓

SourceText: True or False: All children, no matter how they are growing, can learn and develop skills.
text: 所有的孩子，无论心智和身体发育状况如何，都可以去学习、发展技能。

SourceText: ✨You’re right!
text: ✨答对了！

SourceText: 🎉 All children, no matter how they are growing, can learn and develop skills.
text: 🎉 所有的孩子，都可以学习、发展技能。

SourceText: 🔑 Every child is different. They learn at different speeds, and what they can do changes with their age.
text: 🔑 每个孩子的学习速度不同，能力也会随年龄增长而变化。

SourceText: ❌ That’s incorrect!
text: ❌ 不对哦。

SourceText: Talking to your child is the same as talking with your child.
text: 再来一道：“告诉孩子”和“跟孩子对话”是同一回事。

SourceText: 🎈 Children learn new words and build confidence in their language abilities when we try to have a conversation with them.
text: 🎈 跟孩子对话，孩子能学习新词和表达，对语言能力更自信。

SourceText: 🌷 Children may not know how to say many words, but it’s important to continue encouraging them!
text: 🌷 即使孩子没有说太多词语或复杂的句子，也要不断鼓励他们！

SourceText: ⭐ That’s correct!
text: ⭐ 答对了！

SourceText: {F1_FATHER} is a dad committed to positive parenting. Let’s see how he approaches time with his son, {F1_SON_5}:
text: {F1_FATHER}是一位致力于积极育儿的父亲。让我们来看看，他是如何培养儿子{F1_SON_5}的语言能力的：

SourceText: 2️⃣ ASK
text: 2️⃣ 提问

SourceText: 💡 Help your child to talk more by asking questions that don’t have just ‘yes’ or ‘no’ answers.
text: 💡多问孩子开放性问题（答案不仅是“是”或“否”的问题），鼓励孩子多说说话。

SourceText: ✨ Ask questions like, “What would you like to do with your friend later?” or, “Did you do anything special in school today?”
text: ✨ 比如：“你待会想和朋友玩什么呀”，或者“今天在学校发生了什么有趣的事情吗？”

SourceText: 3️⃣ LISTEN
text: 3️⃣ 倾听

SourceText: 👂 Let your child speak too.
text: 👂让你的孩子也有说话的机会。

SourceText: ⏰ Give them time to respond - they may need time to think and express, especially if they are giving longer answers!
text: ⏰ 给孩子足够的时间去回答你的问题。尤其是如果他们想表述一个比较长的答案，就更需要时间去思考和表达。

SourceText: 😃 After giving them time, if it is difficult for them to say what they want, you can help them with prompts!
text: 😃 在给孩子充足的思考时间之后，如果他们还是难以表达自己，这时你可以给他们一些提示和帮助！

SourceText: 4️⃣ BUILD
text: 4️⃣ 巩固和拓展

SourceText: 👂Listen to your child and always respond.
text: 👂用心听孩子说话，并且及时回应，这样可以增强孩子的自信。

SourceText: 🔄 Confirm what they said and add more to help them connect their understanding to new language. For example, if your child says, “There’s a cat,” you could respond, “Yes, there’s a cat making a big hole in the ground”.
text: 🔄 认可孩子说的话，然后在其基础上补充更多内容，这样可以帮孩子扩展言语表达。比如，如果你的孩子说：“那里有只猫”，你可以回答：“是呀，那里有只猫正在地上挖一个大洞”。

SourceText: 5️⃣ TELL STORIES
text: 5️⃣ 讲故事

SourceText: 🎈 Tell your child stories! They can be real, made up, about your lives, or read to them from books.
text: 🎈 多给孩子讲故事！真实的或者虚构的都可以。它既可以来源于日常生活，也可以是直接从书上找来读给他们听的。

SourceText: 😃 Encourage your child to tell stories too. You could show photos and create a story together!
text: 😃 也要鼓励孩子自己讲故事。你们可以找一些图片，一起编故事！

SourceText: 🔄 Be patient! It takes lots of practice to listen to stories, and even more to learn the skill of telling them. 💙
text: 🔄 一定要有耐心！孩子学会听故事是一个漫长的过程，学会讲故事更是需要大量的练习。💙

SourceText: That’s okay. Try to find a time to talk to them, even if it’s just explaining something you’re doing around the house! 💡
text: 没关系。试着找出时间跟他们说说话，哪怕只是解释一下你正在干什么也好！

SourceText: Well done! 🎉 You have learned about helping your child’s language skills! You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare my Child for Success in School.✨
text: 太棒了！🎉你已经掌握了如何培养孩子的语言能力！在“提升儿童学习能力”这个目标模块中，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。✨
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: 💙 Talk with your child as often as you can! Go down to @fields.child_nickname’s level by kneeling or squatting so you can make eye contact when talking to them.
text: 💙 多和孩子说话，越多越好！在和 @fields.child_nickname 说话时，半跪着或者蹲下来，和孩子保持目光接触。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 😃 This will improve your relationship with them as well as their behaviour, because they will understand more of what you say.
text: 😃 这样的话，孩子就能更好地理解你在说什么，这不仅能让你们的亲子关系更加牢固，也能提升孩子的能力和表现。

SourceText: Press Play to learn 5️⃣ five more tips on helping @fields.child_nickname learn:
text: 点击“播放”来学一学，帮助 @fields.child_nickname 培养语言能力的5️⃣个小贴士吧：
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 💙 Talk with your child as often as you can! Go down to your child’s level by kneeling or squatting so you can make eye contact when talking to them.
text: 💙 多和孩子说话，越多越好！在和孩子说话时，半跪着或者蹲下来，和他们保持目光接触。

SourceText: Press Play to learn 5️⃣ five more tips on helping your child learn:
text: 点击“播放”来学一学，帮助孩子培养语言能力的5️⃣个小贴士吧：

SourceText: 5️⃣ Here are 5 tips on helping @fields.child_nickname learn by talking with them.
text: 以下是5️⃣个小贴士，能让你学会：如何通过和 @fields.child_nickname 交谈，来提升语言能力。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 5️⃣ Here are 5 tips on helping your child learn by talking with them.
text: 以下是5️⃣个小贴士，能让你学会：如何通过和孩子交谈，来帮助他们提升语言能力。

SourceText: 1️⃣ EXPLAIN
text: 1️⃣ 解释

SourceText: 😃 Talk with @fields.child_nickname. Describe and explain what you are doing. For example, chat with them while shopping at the market. 🍅
text: 😃 多和 @fields.child_nickname 交流对话。你可以跟他们描述和解释你们在做什么，比如在超市购物的时候，告诉孩子你们要买什么，以及为什么买。🍅
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 👂 Ask @fields.child_nickname questions and listen to their answers!
text: 👂你还可以问 @fields.child_nickname 问题，并且耐心倾听他们的回答！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: ⏯️ Give your child learning opportunities at their own pace. When you give @fields.child_nickname tasks that suit their abilities, it will boost their excitement for learning. 😃
text: ⏯️ 让孩子按照自己的节奏去学习，给 @fields.child_nickname 布置和他们的能力相符的任务，这样可以激发孩子学习的动力和热情。😃
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 😃 Talk with your child. Describe and explain what you are doing. For example, chat with them while shopping at the market. 🍅
text: 😃 多和你的孩子交流对话。你可以跟他们描述和解释你们在做什么，比如在超市购物的时候，告诉孩子你们要买什么，以及为什么买。🍅

SourceText: 👂 Ask your child questions and listen to their answers!
text: 👂你还可以问孩子问题，并且耐心倾听他们的回答！

SourceText: ⏯️ Give your child learning opportunities at their own pace. When you give your child tasks that suit their abilities, it will boost their excitement for learning. 😃
text: ⏯️ 让孩子按照自己的节奏去学习，给孩子布置和他们的能力相符的任务，这样可以激发孩子学习的动力和热情。😃

SourceText: Home Activity! Try to use words and gestures to describe your activities when spending time together. Make sure you communicate in a way that @fields.child_nickname can understand. Can you do it today?⭐
text:
家庭练习！⭐

在今天的亲子时光中，尝试用言语来描述你们正在做的活动。一定要记得，要用 @fields.child_nickname 能理解的方式去沟通交流。

你今天可以试一试吗？⭐
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Home Activity! Try to use words and gestures to describe your activities when spending time together. Make sure you communicate in a way that your child can understand. Can you do it today?⭐
text:
家庭练习！⭐

在今天的亲子时光中，尝试用言语描述你们正在做的活动。一定要记得，要用孩子能理解的方式去沟通交流。

你今天可以试一试吗？⭐

SourceText: Excellent! Using words and gestures that @fields.child_nickname can understand to describe your activities is a great way to help them learn! 💡
text: 太好了！用 @fields.child_nickname 能明白的言语和手势，来描述你们的活动，这是提升他们语言能力的好方法！💡
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Excellent! Using words and gestures that your child can understand to describe your activities is a great way to help them learn! 💡
text: 太好了！用孩子能明白的言语和手势，来描述你们的活动，这有助于提升孩子的语言能力！💡

SourceText: 📖This skill is about helping your child learn to read.
text: 📖想要提高孩子的阅读能力吗？🤩

SourceText: 2️⃣This skill will take 2 days to complete.
text: 这项技能共有2️⃣课。

SourceText: ⭐ Our first lesson today is about enjoying books with your child.
text: ⭐ 第一课：亲子共读。

SourceText: Reading with your child is the best way to help your child learn to read. 📖🎉
text: 亲子共读——提高孩子阅读能力的最好方法！🔑📖🎉

SourceText: Children learn by watching, listening, and copying. When you read to them when they are little, they learn new words. Later they learn character shapes and letter sounds, and when they’re bigger, reading together can help them learn about anything they are interested in! 💡
text:
亲子共读时，儿童能通过观察、聆听和模仿来学习。

比如，孩子能学会新词语。

然后，又学会汉字的读音和书写。

慢慢地，亲子共读能帮他们学习任何他们感兴趣的东西！💡

SourceText: Let’s see how {F1_FATHER} reads with his son, {F1_SON_5}. Notice how he uses the pictures in the book to teach.
text: 让我们来看看，{F1_FATHER}和他的儿子{F1_SON_5}是怎么共读的。请你重点关注，他是如何运用书中的图片来互动和提问的。

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four ways to help your child learn reading skills
text: 以下是帮你的孩子培养阅读能力的4️⃣种方法

SourceText: 1️⃣ MAKE ROUTINES
text: 1️⃣ 养成习惯

SourceText: 📖 You can share books with your child anywhere!
text: 📖 随时随地，你都可以和孩子共读！

SourceText: Choose a good place at home to share books. Get rid of any distractions (like turning off the TV 📺❌).
text: 你们可以在家里找个共读的好地方，一定要避免任何可能让你们分心的东西（比如把电视关掉📺❌）。

SourceText: ⏰ Pick a time every day when you can share books with your child.
text: ⏰ 尽量每天都找一段时间，和孩子共读。

SourceText: 💡 If your child wants to, let them choose a book 😃
text: 💡如果孩子想要自己选书来读，那再好不过了😃

SourceText: ✨ If you don’t have any books in your home - you can use anything with words and pictures, like old magazines, leaflets, or newspapers!
text: ✨如果你家里没有书，你可以用任何带有文字和图片的东西，比如旧杂志、传单或报纸！

SourceText: 2️⃣ ASK QUESTIONS
text: 2️⃣ 向孩子提问

SourceText: ⭐ From the book cover, ask your child what they think the story might be about.
text: ⭐ 从书的封面开始，就问问孩子，他们认为这个故事可能会讲些什么。

SourceText: ➡️ Throughout the book, ask your child who, what, where, when, why, and how questions.
text: ➡️ 在读书的过程中，问问孩子故事发生的时间、地点、人物、内容、起因、经过、结果等等。

SourceText: ✨ If you have read a story many times, see if your child knows what comes next!
text: ✨ 如果这个故事已经讲过很多遍了，看看孩子记不记得接下来的故事情节是什么！

SourceText: 👀 Describe what’s happening in a picture. Always use language that your child can understand.
text: 👀 和孩子一起描述书中图片讲述的内容。记得要一直用孩子能听懂的语言。

SourceText: 💡 Ask your child to retell the story.
text: 💡 让你的孩子试着复述故事内容。

SourceText: 3️⃣ RESPOND AND EXPLORE
text: 3️⃣ 回应和探索

SourceText: 👀 Notice what your child is interested in and talk about it. Help them understand the story, characters, sounds, and character emotions. 💚
text: 👀 注意你的孩子对什么感兴趣，多聊聊他们感兴趣的点。帮助他们理解故事、认识汉字、了解字词发音和人物情感。 💚

SourceText: 📖 Explore by rephrasing or adding more information - help your child learn new words and understand the book more 😃
text: 📖 试着对故事展开探索，比如用另一种方法去描述它，或再添加些新的信息进去。这样能帮孩子认识更多新词汇，并且更好的理解故事哦。😃

SourceText: 👂 Respond positively and encourage them, even if what they are wrong.
text: 👂无论孩子的对错，积极地回应他们，热情地鼓励他们。

SourceText: 😃 Ask your child to repeat what you have taught them.
text: 😃 让孩子试着复述你教的内容。

SourceText: 4️⃣ BUILD AND CONNECT
text: 4️⃣ 建立自信，联系生活

SourceText: 💙 Help your child build confidence by asking questions that they might know the answer to or that encourage them to go a bit further with their skill!
text: 💙 问孩子一些他们知道答案的问题，并引导他们进一步发挥，从而提升孩子的表达能力，并建立孩子的自信。

SourceText: 🎨 Always connect what’s in the book to your child’s experience.
text: 🎨 别忘了把书本里面的内容和孩子的实际生活经验联系起来。

SourceText: Home Activity! Can you read with your child today? ⭐
text:
家庭练习！⭐

和孩子一起读绘本，可以问一些简单的问题。🌟

比如“你看里面的人/小动物在做什么呢”❓

指着图片里的画面，鼓励孩子描述图片中的事物、动作和场景。🌟

要不要和孩子一起试试呢？❤️

SourceText: Excellent! Reading with your child is a great way to help them learn!
text: 太好了，和孩子共读将帮他们提升学习能力！

SourceText: That’s okay. It’s not always possible to read with your child. Try to find a little bit of time every day because it will help your child learn.
text: 没关系。之后请每天抽一点时间，来与孩子共读，这能大大提升孩子的学习能力！📝

SourceText: Well done! 🎉 You have learnt the first part about helping your child learn reading skills! You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare my Child for Success in School.✨
text: 太棒了！🎉你已经掌握了提高孩子阅读能力的第一部分！至此，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。继续朝着“提升儿童学习能力”的目标迈进吧。✨
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: True or False: Reading with @fields.child_nickname only involves reading the words with the correct emotions.
text: 和 @fields.child_nickname 共读时，有感情地朗读出来就够了。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: True or False: Reading with your child only involves reading the words with the correct emotions.
text: 和孩子共读时，有感情地朗读出来就够了。

SourceText: 👂 While it’s fun to read with emotions, it can also help to ask children questions and explore the story with them.
text: 👂 加入提问和互动，才更有效哦！🤩

SourceText: 🔑 @fields.child_nickname will practise saying new words and develop an interest in reading.
text: 🔑 这样能帮 @fields.child_nickname 练习新词和表达，培养阅读兴趣！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🔑 your child will practise saying new words and develop an interest in reading.
text: 🔑 这样能帮孩子练习新词和表达，培养阅读兴趣！

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four ways to help your child learn reading skills.
text: 如何像漫画中的爸爸一样，高效利用亲子共读，提升孩子学习能力？

SourceText: If reading is difficult for you, just use books with pictures. Describe what you see and talk about the pictures with @fields.child_nickname using language that your child can understand. This will still help them learn! 💙
text: 4️⃣个小妙招，轻松拿捏和  @fields.child_nickname 共读的关键技巧！❤️
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: If reading is difficult for you, just use books with pictures. Describe what you see and talk about the pictures with your child using language that your child can understand. This will still help them learn! 💙
text: 4️⃣个小妙招，轻松拿捏和孩子共读的关键技巧！❤️

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four ways to help your child learn reading skills: Make Routines ⏰, Ask Questions, Respond and Explore 👀, and Build and Connect 😃
text: 如何像漫画中的爸爸一样，高效利用亲子共读，提升孩子学习能力？

SourceText: Hello! Today, we are learning more about helping your child become a better reader.
text: 今天学习培养阅读能力的第二课。

SourceText: 📖 It is about word games and writing. 📝
text: 📖 词汇游戏和书写随练。📝

SourceText: Learning to read begins with understanding language, characters, and sounds. 🎵
text: 培养阅读能力是从理解语言、文字和发音开始的。 🎵

SourceText: Understanding the sounds in words and starting to write simple characters will help your child learn to read. 📖⭐
text: 可以让孩子先了解汉字的发音，并尝试简单的书写。 📖⭐

SourceText: True or False: You should start reading books with your child only once they’ve begun to learn in school.
text: 等孩子进入学龄阶段后，才需要和他们共读。

SourceText: ⭐ Parents should read with their child early in life. You can actually start from the day they are born!
text: ⭐ 从孩子出生起，就应该开始和孩子共读！

SourceText: 🏆 Reading with children is a great way to prepare them for success in school.
text: 🏆 这是提升孩子学习能力的好方法。

SourceText: 🌷 That’s correct.
text: 🌷 答对了。

SourceText: You’ve completed 33% of this skill! Press NEXT to continue.
text: 你已经完成了33％！点击“下一步”继续学习吧。

SourceText: ▶️ Press play to learn 4️⃣ four more tips on helping your child learn to read.
text:
怎么让孩子学习字词和书写呢？

快来看看这4️⃣个小贴士！

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four more ways to help your child learn reading skills: Use Books to Learn, Notice Characters, Play Word Games, and Try Writing.
text:
怎么让孩子学习字词和书写呢？

快来看看这4️⃣个小贴士！

SourceText: 1️⃣ USE BOOKS TO LEARN
text: 1️⃣ 找到书本

SourceText: 💡 Books with no words help with imagination, ideas, and learning new words. Together, name and describe what is in the pictures.
text: 💡 无字绘本有助于发挥想象力和创意，也能帮助孩子学习新词汇。来和孩子一起看图说话吧。

SourceText: ⭐ Books with words help to understand what different characters look like and sound.
text: ⭐ 有文字的书则有助于孩子理解字词的样子和发音。

SourceText: 🎵 Focus on words that rhyme and repeat, like “xiaozuiba, dahonghua.”
text: 🎵 多用些押韵和对仗的词语和句子，比如“小嘴巴，大红花”。

SourceText: ➡️ Point to each word and say it aloud to help your child recognise some of the characters and sounds!
text: ➡️ 指着每个字并且大声念出来，这样能帮孩子认字和发音！

SourceText: 2️⃣ NOTICE CHARACTERS
text: 2️⃣ 注意周围的字词

SourceText: 👀 Look for characters everywhere, such as on signs and packages.
text: 👀 四处找找字词，比如在标志和包装上找。

SourceText: 💡Point the characters out to your child and name them.
text: 💡把这些字词指给你的孩子看，并念出来。

SourceText: 👂 Ask your child to find characters and name them, too!
text: 👂也让孩子自己找一些字词，并试着念出来！

SourceText: 3️⃣ PLAY WORD GAMES
text: 3️⃣ 词汇游戏

SourceText: PLAY WORD GAMES Chinese replacement 1
text: 💡 根据孩子情况，准备一些字词卡，例如一、二、三、人、王等。

SourceText: PLAY WORD GAMES Chinese replacement 2
text: ▶️ 在地面上画几个大圆圈，每个圆圈中放一张字词卡。对孩子说：“请到'王'字圈中站，看谁站得快又对。”

SourceText: PLAY WORD GAMES Chinese replacement 3
text: 🔄 换孩子说：“请到‘三’字圈中站，看谁站得快又对。”

SourceText: 4️⃣ TRY WRITING 📝
text: 4️⃣ 书写随练 📝

SourceText: 🧸🌷 Encourage your child to draw. They can start by drawing things they like, such as animals or flowers.
text: 🧸🌷 鼓励孩子画画。可以从画一些自己喜欢的东西开始，比如动物或者花朵。

SourceText: ▶️ Next, show them how to draw shapes that look like characters: 🔵🔶
text: ▶️ 接下来，教他们画汉字的形状🔵🔶

SourceText: 😃 Later, help them write simple characters. Maybe start with their last name!
text: 😃 再之后，教他们写一些简单的字词。或许可以从他们的姓氏开始学！

SourceText: 🔄 Practise and add characters until they can write their whole name. Then learn  other simple characters!
text: 🔄 不断练习，然后再加入一些字，直到他们能写出自己的全名。接着再学习其他简单的字词！

SourceText: You’ve completed 66% of this skill! Press NEXT to continue.
text: 你已经完成了66％！点击“下一步”继续学习。

SourceText: Home Activity! Can you draw or write with your child today? ⭐
text:
家庭练习！⭐

和孩子一起画形状，或写名字。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: Excellent! Drawing and writing with your child is a great way to help them learn! 📝
text: 太棒了！和孩子一起画画、写字是帮助他们学习的好方法！📝

SourceText: That’s okay. It’s not always possible to do this with your child. Try to find a bit of time to write with your child every day - it will help them learn! 📝
text: 没关系。之后请每天抽一点时间，来与孩子共读，这能大大提升孩子的学习能力！📝

SourceText: Well done! 🎉 You have learnt the second part of the skill to help your child learn reading skills! You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare my Child for Success in School. ✨
text: 太棒了！🎉你已经掌握了提高孩子阅读能力的第二部分！至此，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项，继续朝着“提升儿童学习能力”的目标迈进吧。✨
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: This skill is about introducing your child to numbers and maths. 1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣
text:
想知道如何培养孩子的数学能力吗❓

先学学向孩子介绍数字和数学的概念吧！1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣

SourceText: ⭐ Learning about numbers, shapes, and groups will help your child understand basic maths.
text: ⭐ 在家学习数字、形状和分类，能帮助孩子了解数学。

SourceText: 🎓 This will prepare them to succeed in school.
text: 🎓 也为学校学习打下基础！

SourceText: Let’s do a quiz. Select the correct option:
text: 小测试。

SourceText: Where do children learn maths?
text: 孩子们可以在哪里学到数学呢？

SourceText: 🌷 Children learn maths nearly everywhere - and you can help!
text: 🌷 孩子可以在任何地方学数学，并且你也能帮忙！

SourceText: ⭐ That’s right!
text: ⭐ 答对了！

SourceText: 3️⃣ Here are three ways to help your child learn number skills: Count, Look for Numbers, and Learn with Shapes.
text: 在家培养孩子的数学能力，有3️⃣种游戏：数一数、找数字和认形状。

SourceText: Remember: maths, numbers, amounts of things, and shapes are everywhere! 🔶🌷🔵
text: 数字和形状无处不在！🔶🌷🔵

SourceText: You can use what is around you and your daily routines to talk to your child about maths. ⏰ This will help prepare them for success. ⭐
text:
多利用身边的事物，来教孩子数字和形状。⏰ 
这将为他们取得好成绩打下基础。⭐

SourceText: 1️⃣ COUNT
text: 1️⃣ 数一数

SourceText: 🔴 Counting is a skill your child can start to learn early. 1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣
text: 🔴 计数能力可以从孩子很小的时候就开始培养。1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣

SourceText: 🚗 Ask your child to count things around you: cars, people, houses, how many steps between one place and another, and their fingers and toes! 👋
text: 🚗 平时就可以让孩子数数身边的事物：比如有几辆车，多少人，几栋房子，从一个地方和另一个地方之间要走多少步，也可以数数有几根手指头、几根脚趾头！👋

SourceText: 🍅 Ask your child to count things in daily activities: count things while cooking, like potatoes, while sorting out clothes, like socks, or while at the supermarket.
text: 🍅 让孩子在日常活动中数东西：比如，做饭时数有多少土豆，叠衣服时数有多少袜子，逛超市时数有多少货架

SourceText: 🎵 Sing songs that include numbers with your child.
text: 🎵 和孩子一起唱一些包含数字的歌曲。

SourceText: 🎨 Encourage your child to draw things, and ask them how many things there are in the pictures.
text: 🎨 鼓励孩子画画，并问他们画了几样东西。

SourceText: 2️⃣ LOOK FOR NUMBERS
text: 2️⃣ 寻找数字

SourceText: 📱Numbers are all around us if you look for them. They’re on food packaging, and even on the TV remote.
text: 📱仔细找找就会发现，数字无处不在。从食品包装到电视遥控器，里面都藏着数字呢。

SourceText: 👀 Wherever you see a number, ask your child what it is.
text: 👀你可以在看到数字的时候，随时问孩子这是几！

SourceText: 😃 Help them if they don’t know!
text: 😃 如果他们不知道的话就帮帮他们！

SourceText: 3️⃣ LEARN WITH SHAPES
text: 3️⃣ 学习形状

SourceText: 🔷 Learning about shapes is also important in maths! Shapes are everywhere, too, so find them and talk about them. You could even make them! 👀
text: 🔷 学习形状在数学中也很重要，而且形状也无处不在。你可以找一些出来跟孩子讨论。你甚至可以亲手做一些形状出来！👀

SourceText: 🔴 Help your child draw different shapes.
text: 🔴 帮助孩子画出各种不同的形状。

SourceText: 🔵 If you can, cut them out and help your child sort them into groups (by colour, shape, size, or however else your child wants!) Ask them why they are sorting in that way.
text: 🔵如果可以的话，把它们剪下来，帮孩子把它们分为不同的几组，比如按颜色、形状、大小，或者孩子想要的其他方式进行分类，问问他们为什么想这样做分类。

SourceText: 🔶 Talk about the shapes with your child, and have fun with them! 😃
text: 🔶 在和孩子学习形状的过程中，记得找到乐趣，寓教于乐！😃

SourceText: Home activity! ⭐ Try to involve your child in an activity with numbers. For example, counting the amount of ingredients when you are cooking. Can you do it today?
text:
家庭练习！🌟 

和孩子一起玩玩串珠子游戏吧！

准备一条绳子和一些珠子，将珠子逐个串到绳子上，数一数有几个珠子。💙

可以对孩子说，“现在你串起了一个珠子，要串第二个珠子啦”，“真棒，你已经串起了三个珠子”。

你今天有时间试一试吗？⏰

SourceText: Great! 💙 Involving your child in activities like this and talking about numbers and amounts of things will help them learn!
text: 太棒啦！💙跟孩子数数，能帮他们认识数字！

SourceText: That's OK! If you don't have time today, try to involve your child tomorrow. Activities that use numbers and talking about amounts of things will help your child learn!
text: 没关系！试着明天抽点时间陪孩子数数，提升他们的数学能力！

SourceText: Skill complete! You have learnt to help your child learn number skills!
text: 达成新技能！你已经掌握了如何向孩子介绍数字和数学的概念！

SourceText: You have now completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare My Child for Success in School. ⭐
text: 你现在已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。离“提升儿童学习能力”的目标又近了一步。⭐
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help @fields.child_nickname gain number skills.
text: ▶️点击“播放” ，开始学习3️⃣种培养 @fields.child_nickname 数学能力的方法吧。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help your child gain number skills.
text: ▶️点击“播放”，开始学习 3️⃣种培养孩子数学能力的方法吧。

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help @fields.child_nickname gain number skills
text: ▶️点击“播放”，开始学习3️⃣种培养 @fields.child_nickname 数学能力的方法吧。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help your child gain number skills
text: ▶️点击“播放”，开始学习3️⃣种培养孩子数学能力的方法吧。

SourceText: Today we will continue with the skill “Help your child get ready for maths.” ✨
text: 继续学学如何培养孩子的数学能力吧！✨

SourceText: Here, we are focusing on some more challenging activities that you can do with your child once they are ready 💡
text: 学习加减法和分类法，能让孩子的数学更进一步。⭐

SourceText: Learning about comparing, adding, and subtracting will help your child understand more about maths. This will continue to help them learn number skills. 🔟/🔟 ⭐
text: 今天的内容，你可以等孩子有一定基础后再拿出来用。 💡

SourceText: Let’s see how {F1_MOTHER} is practising numbers with her son, {F1_SON_5} in the kitchen:
text: 让我们看看，{F1_MOTHER}和儿子{F1_SON_5}，是怎样在厨房里练习加减法的：

SourceText: Once your child knows about numbers and groups of things, they can start learning more number skills⭐
text: 漫画里的妈妈巧妙地利用做饭的机会，来和孩子练习加减法⭐

SourceText: Remember to go slowly and have fun with things that your child can nearly do! 😃
text: 😃那么，你在生活中具体可以做些什么，来帮孩子练习分类和加减，提高数学能力呢？

SourceText: ▶️ Press play to learn 4️⃣ four ways you can encourage your child to practise his number skills.
text: 4️⃣种小方法，助你培养孩子的数学能力！

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four ways for you to encourage your child to practise his number skills:
text: 4️⃣种小方法，助你培养孩子的数学能力！

SourceText: 1️⃣ SORTING AND ORGANISING
text: 1️⃣ 分类和排序

SourceText: 🌱 Ask your child to help sort things into groups, such as putting all the leaves together when cooking.
text: 🌱 让孩子帮忙分类，比如，在做饭的时候，可以让他们把所有的绿叶蔬菜放在一起。

SourceText: 😃 Ask your child to find 5 of something, and then to order them from smallest to biggest. You can use something like sticks.
text: 😃 让孩子找5个毛球，然后把它们按从小到大的顺序排列。

SourceText: ⬆️ Then order them a different way, like from lightest to darkest!
text: ⬆️然后再用另一种方式进行排序，比如颜色从浅到深！

SourceText: ✨ Help your child think about groups! Say: “An onion is a round red vegetable. Can you think of something else that is red like an onion?” Then: “Can you think of something that is also round but bigger than an onion?” ⚽
text: ✨ 帮孩子理解何为同类型。你可以问：“洋葱是一种圆形的紫色蔬菜。你还能想到别的像洋葱一样紫色的东西吗？” 然后，你还可以进一步问：“你能想到什么东西也是圆的，但比洋葱大吗？” ⚽

SourceText: 2️⃣ ADDING AND SUBTRACTING
text: 2️⃣ 加减法

SourceText: ⬆️⬇️ Once they know about numbers, your child might be able to start learning about adding and subtracting!
text: ⬆️⬇️ 一旦你的孩子学会了数字，就可以开始学习加减法了！

SourceText: 🍚 Use activities similar to counting exercises, like cooking, sorting clothes, or shopping!
text: 🍚 学习加减法也可以在日常活动中进行，比如做饭、分类衣服或购物！

SourceText: 🍅 Say “I have two potatoes. When I add two more, how many do I have?” Help your child get the answer! Keep practising and, after a while, make it more difficult!
text: 🥔 跟他们说：“我有2个土豆，如果我再拿2个，那么我一共有多少个土豆？” 可以给孩子一点提示.。练习几次后，加大难度。

SourceText: ⚽ Try the activity with different things like balls or shoes.
text: ⚽ 尝试用不同的东西来玩，比如球或者鞋子。

SourceText: ⬇️ Repeat the activity, but take things away: “I have five potatoes. When I take two away, how many do I have?”
text: ⬇️ 重复以上游戏，但是这次做减法，比如：“我有5个球，如果我拿走2个，那我还剩几个？”

SourceText: 🔄 Practise anywhere and everywhere! You can also do the game in your imaginations.
text: 🔄 你们随时随地都能玩这个游戏！即使身边没有东西，你们也可以通过想象来进行加减法。

SourceText: 3️⃣ WAYS TO MAKE A NUMBER
text: 3️⃣ 生活中的加减法

SourceText: ⏰ Once your child is old enough and has learned some number skills, they can start learning harder skills.
text: ⏰ 如果你的孩子足够大，并已经掌握了一些数学能力，他们就可以开始学习更难的东西啦。

SourceText: 5️⃣ If you think they are ready, ask them to find 5 stones. Show them that you can make 5 stones with one group of 1 stone and another of 4 stones
text: 如果你觉得他们可以的话，试着让他们找5️⃣块石头。给他们展示，1块石头和4块石头合在一起，就有5块石头。

SourceText: then show them with one group of 2 and one group of 3.
text: 然后再把石头分成一堆2块的和一堆3块的。

SourceText: 🔟 When they are ready for more difficult challenges, do the same activity with more stones, up to 10.
text: 当他们掌握得差不多了，逐步加入更多的石头，一直加到🔟块。

SourceText: 4️⃣ ENCOURAGE AND HAVE FUN
text: 4️⃣ 鼓励并享受其中

SourceText: 💚 Remember, go slowly and help your child build confidence by doing things that they are ready for and know how to do.
text: 💚一定要记得慢慢来。带领孩子做一些他们能力范围内，能明白该怎么去做的事情，这可以增强他们的自信心。

SourceText: 😃 Always encourage their effort and praise them. Wrong answers are okay, too!
text: 😃 注意到他们的努力，多表扬他们。即使他们做错了也没关系！

SourceText: 🎉 Try to make learning fun and enjoyable to your child. It will make them more likely to keep trying.
text: 🎉 试着让学习变得轻松有趣。这样孩子会更愿意继续学习。

SourceText: Home activity! ⭐ Can you do an activity with adding and subtracting with your child? You can do that while cooking with them again, or with other objects - like playing outside with stones!
text:
家庭练习！⭐ 

刚刚提到了很多数学小游戏，比如分类蔬菜、数土豆、数石子……今天挑一个和孩子玩一玩吧！

SourceText: Great! 💙 These activities will help your child learn!
text: 太棒了！💙 加减法游戏将提升孩子的数学能力！

SourceText: That's OK! If you don't have time today, try to do some adding and subtracting activities with your child tomorrow.
text: 没关系！试着明天和孩子一起做些数学游戏吧。

SourceText: 📖This skill is about helping your child learn skills to prepare them for reading when they are older. ⭐
text: 📖 想要提高孩子的阅读能力吗？🤩今天的课程，帮孩子自主阅读做准备！⭐

SourceText: Reading with your child is the best way to help your child learn to read. 🔑
text: 亲子共读——提高孩子阅读能力的最好方法！🔑

SourceText: It is one of the best ways to help them learn to read themselves and develop well. 🎉
text: 这不仅帮孩子学会自主阅读，还能促进孩子全面发展。🎉

SourceText: When they’re little, they learn new words, and it helps with attention and language! 💡
text: 比如，提高专注度和表达能力！💡

SourceText: Let’s watch {F1_FATHER} read with his daughter, {F1_DAUGHTER_2}. Notice how he asks the child lots of questions and describes things.
text: 来看看，{F1_FATHER}是如何用互动和提问，和{F1_DAUGHTER_2}一起阅读的？

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn the 5️⃣ five ways to prepare your child for learning how to read when they are older.
text: 想像漫画里的爸爸一样，让孩子爱上阅读吗？5️⃣个小妙招，轻松拿捏亲子共读的关键技巧。😊

SourceText: 5️⃣ Here are five ways to prepare your child for learning how to read when they are older. The activities all focus on reading books together 💙
text: 想像漫画里的爸爸一样，让孩子爱上阅读吗？5️⃣个小妙招，轻松拿捏亲子共读的关键技巧。😊

SourceText: 1️⃣ SHARE BOOKS
text: 1️⃣ 亲子共读

SourceText: 💡 Books with no words help with imagination, ideas, and learning new words. Together, name and describe what is in the pictures.Try to communicate in a way that your child can understand.
text: 💡 无字绘本有助于发挥孩子的想象力，帮助他们学习新词汇。你可以和孩子一起用自己的话去描述画面。过程中记得要用孩子能理解的方式来交流。

SourceText: ⭐ Books with words help to understand characters and sounds!
text: ⭐ 带字的书则有助于孩子理解字词和发音！

SourceText: 🎵 Focus on words that rhyme and repeat,  like “xiaozuiba, dahonghua.”
text: 🎵 注意多使用押韵和对仗的词句，比如“小嘴巴，大红花”。

SourceText: 2️⃣MAKE ROUTINES
text: 2️⃣养成习惯

SourceText: 3️⃣ ASK QUESTIONS
text: 3️⃣ 学会提问

SourceText: 👀 From the book cover, ask your child what they think the story might be about.
text: 👀 从书的封面开始，就问问孩子，他们认为这个故事可能会讲些什么。

SourceText: ✨ When your child doesn’t know the name of the object you pointed at, point at it and say what it is. This will help your child learn new words.
text: ✨ 如果孩子不知道你指的东西叫什么，你可以再次指着那个东西，并告诉他们这是什么。这有助于孩子学习新的词汇。

SourceText: ☀️ If you have read a story many times, see if your child knows what comes next!
text: ☀️如果这个故事已经讲过很多遍了，看看孩子记不记得接下来的故事情节是什么！

SourceText: 👀 Describe what’s happening in a picture.
text: 👀 描述图片中画了什么。

SourceText: 4️⃣ RESPOND AND EXPLORE
text: 4️⃣ 回应和探索

SourceText: 👀 Notice what your child is interested in and talk about it. Help them understand the story and character emotions. 💚
text: 👀 关注孩子的兴趣所在，多谈论他们感兴趣的点。也可以去帮助他们理解故事和人物情感。 💚

SourceText: 🎈 Explore their responses by rephrasing or adding more information - help your child learn new words and understand the book more 😃
text: 🎈试着用另一种方法去描述这个故事，或再添加些新的信息进去，看看孩子会有什么反应。这样能帮孩子认识更多新词汇，并且更好的理解故事哦。😃

SourceText: 💙 When your child talks about the book or answers your questions about the book, respond positively and encourage them, even if they are wrong.
text: 💙 当孩子和你聊这本书，或着回答你的问题时，要积极回应并鼓励他们，就算他们说的不对也没关系。

SourceText: 👂 Ask your child to repeat what you have taught them.
text: 👂 让孩子试着复述你教的内容。

SourceText: 5️⃣ CONNECT
text: 5️⃣ 联系生活

SourceText: 🌷 Always connect what’s in the book to your child’s experience.
text: 🌷 别忘了把书本里面的内容和孩子的实际生活经验联系起来。

SourceText: Well done! 🎉 You have learnt about helping your child learn reading skills! You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare my Child for Success in School.✨
text: 太棒了！🎉你已经掌握了如何提高孩子的阅读能力！至此，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。继续朝着“提升儿童学习能力”的目标迈进吧。✨
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: 👂 While it’s fun to read with emotions, it is more effective to ask children questions and explore their response and the story with them.
text: 👂 读故事时加入情感固然有趣，但是如果能通过提问和互动，来和孩子一起探索故事，会更加有效哦。

SourceText: 🌷 Children don’t just learn maths in school.
text: 🌷 孩子们不是只在学校里才能学数学。

SourceText: 💙 They can learn maths in lots of ways - and you can help!
text: 💙 他们可以在任何地方学数学，并且你也能帮上忙！

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help your child learn number skills.
text: ▶️点击“播放”，开始学习3️⃣种培养孩子数学能力的方法吧。

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 3️⃣ three ways you can help your child learn number skills
text: ▶️点击“播放”，开始学习3️⃣种培养孩子数学能力的方法吧。

SourceText: 🔷 Help your child learn about shapes! Shapes are everywhere, too, so find them and talk about them. You could even make them! 👀
text: 🔷陪孩子一起学习形状吧！形状无处不在，你可以找一些出来给孩子看。你甚至可以亲手做一些形状出来！👀

SourceText: Home activity! ⭐ Can you do some counting with your child today?
text: 家庭练习！⭐你今天有空与孩子一起数数吗？

SourceText: Great! 💙 Counting with your child will introduce them to numbers!
text: 太棒啦！💙跟孩子数数，能帮他们开始认识数字！

SourceText: That's OK! If you don't have time today, try to count with your child tomorrow. This will help your child learn!
text: 没关系！如果你今天没时间，试着明天抽点时间陪孩子数数吧。这有助于提升他们的数学能力！

SourceText: This skill is about connecting with your child’s school and their teacher(s). 📖✨
text: 怎样知道孩子在学校的情况到底怎么样呢？

SourceText: True or False: Knowing what my child is doing in school won’t help them learn.
text: 了解孩子在学校做些什么，对帮助他们学习毫无意义。

SourceText: 💡 If you know what your child is learning in school, you can help your child learn by talking to them about it and practising with them at home!
text: 💡 知道孩子在学校学了什么，就可以和他们一起巩固、练习！

SourceText: 🎉 That’s correct.
text: 🎉 答对了！

SourceText: 4️⃣ Here are four ways to engage with your child’s school and the things they are learning about.
text: 想知道如何配合学校，帮助孩子进步吗？4️⃣个小贴士，帮你与学校相互配合，提升孩子在学校的表现。

SourceText: Here’s an audio message about engaging with your child’s school 🎵
text: 这是一条关于如何与孩子学校互动的音频🎵

SourceText: 1️⃣ CONNECT
text: 1️⃣ 保持联系

SourceText: 👋 Make sure you know your child’s teacher and have their phone number or WeChat.
text: 👋 确保你认识孩子的老师，有他们的电话号码或微信。

SourceText: 👂 Each time you have the chance to speak to your child’s teacher, ask them what your child is doing in school, and how you can help them.
text: 👂 每次跟老师聊天的时候，都可以问问孩子在学校学些什么，以及你可以帮上什么忙。

SourceText: 🔔 Let the teacher and school know that you are available to receive messages about anything related to the school and your child’s learning.
text: 🔔 让老师和学校知道，你很乐意接收有关学校和你孩子学习的任何消息，请他们有需要时随时与你联系。

SourceText: 2️⃣ ASK 🔑
👂 Ask your child what they have been doing in school.
text: 👂 问问你的孩子，他们在学校都做些什么。

SourceText: 😃 Did they do or see something they liked? Were they interested in anything particular?
text: 😃 有没有做过或看到过什么喜欢的东西？有对什么东西尤其感兴趣吗？

SourceText: 👀 Notice what they like and what interests them. Ask them questions and talk about these interests .
text: 👀 留意他们喜欢和感兴趣的东西。多问问他们，围绕他们感兴趣的东西聊一聊。

SourceText: 3️⃣ PRACTISE 🔄

🎨 If your child has been doing something in school that they can do at home, help them practise it! For example, if they enjoyed working with colours at school, ask them to find as many colours as they can around the home.
text: 🎨 如果你孩子在学校做的事情，在家里也能做，就尽量地让他们多做。比如，如果他们在学校喜欢色彩缤纷的东西，就让他们在家里也多找找颜色。

SourceText: 📖 If they can bring books home from school, read them together!
text: 📖 如果他们能从学校带书回家，你就可以和他们一起阅读！

SourceText: 💡If something in school was difficult, see if you can help your child understand it!
text: 💡 如果孩子在学校遇到了难题， 看看你能不能帮他们找到解决办法！

SourceText: 4️⃣ GET INVOLVED 🏁
text: 4️⃣ 参与其中 🏁

SourceText: 🚗 If you have time, attend events or meetings at your child’s school. Find out as much as you can when you do.
text: 🚗 如果你有时间，可以去参加孩子学校的活动或家长会。在参与活动时，尽量多去了解点孩子的情况。

SourceText: ⏰ If you have time, volunteer to help with activities happening with your child’s school! This will help you get to know the school, teachers, and the other parents 😃
text: ⏰ 如果有空，你可以在学校举办活动时主动帮忙！这样你可以更了解学校、老师和其他家长。 😃

SourceText: Home Activity! Talk to your child about what they are doing at school at the moment. Can you do it today? ⭐
text:
家庭练习！⭐

问问孩子，他们目前在学校都做些什么、过得怎么样。

你今天有空试一试吗？

SourceText: Excellent! See if you can practise what they learned in school at home! 😃
text: 太棒啦！看看有什么是你能在家里陪孩子继续巩固、练习的。😃

SourceText: That’s okay. There isn’t always time to speak about school properly. Ask them about school next time they have been, even if it’s just for a few minutes, or while eating together! 😃
text: 没关系。下次试着找机会和他们好好聊聊学校的事吧，哪怕只有几分钟。也可以趁着一起吃饭的时候聊一聊！😃

SourceText: Well done! 🎉 You have finished the lesson on engaging with your child’s school! You have completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Prepare my Child for Success in School.✨
text: 太棒了！🎉你已经知道了如何与孩子的学校建立和保持联系！至此，你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。继续朝着“提升儿童学习能力”的目标迈进吧。✨
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: Talking to your child’s teacher(s) will help you understand what your child is doing in school. ⭐
text: 关键在于，和老师保持沟通⭐

SourceText: You will also know what kinds of things @fields.child_nickname can do at home to learn better, and how you can help your child! 🎓
text: 问问老师， @fields.child_nickname 能在家里练习什么知识点，你可以怎么帮忙。🎓
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You will also know what kinds of things your child can do at home to learn better, and how you can help your child! 🎓
text: 问问老师，孩子能在家里练习什么知识点，你可以怎么帮忙。🎓

SourceText: True or False: Children learn more when they are told what to do instead of letting them explore and play.
text: 相比让孩子自己探索和玩耍，直接告诉他们怎么做，能让他们学到更多东西。

SourceText: 🌷 Did you know that children naturally explore the world around them creatively?
text: 🌷 孩子天生就会探索周围的世界，并且很有创造力。

SourceText: 🎨 Research shows that children learn best when doing things instead of listening to instructions.
text: 🎨 比起听从指令，孩子自己实践时的学习效果更好。

SourceText: 🧸 Creating opportunities for your child to explore the world through play is the best way to help them learn!
text: 🧸 帮助孩子学习的最佳方式是为孩子创造机会，让他们通过游戏探索世界，与家长互动，激发想象力！

SourceText: 🎉 That’s correct!
text: 🎉 答对了！

SourceText: 🎨 Research shows that children learn best when doing things instead of listening to instructions.
text: 🎨 比起听从指令，孩子自己实践时的学习效果更好。

SourceText: {F3_MOTHER} wants to spend more time helping her daughter, {F3_DAUGTHER_4}, learn through play together. Let’s see how both of them do it:
text: {F3_MOTHER}想和女儿{F3_DAUGTHER_4}一起边玩边学。让我们看看他们是怎么做的：

SourceText: That's OK! 💙 If you don't have time today, set some time aside to play together tomorrow.
text: 没关系！💙试着明天留出时间和孩子一起玩吧！⚽️

SourceText: You have now completed @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) out of @fields.c_n_mod skills towards your goal, Understand Child Development. ⭐
text: 你已经完成了 @fields.c_n_mod 项技能中的 @(fields.c_n_mod_compl +1) 项。继续朝着“促进儿童成长发展”的目标迈进吧。⭐
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.n_skills_week and results.n_skills are numbers

SourceText: 🧸 This skill is about supporting @fields.child_nickname to find joy in learning in a playful and fun way. 😃
text: 🧸 想知道如何让 @fields.child_nickname 找到学习的乐趣吗？快来学学吧！😃
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🧸 This skill is about supporting your child to find joy in learning in a playful and fun way. 😃
text: 🧸 想知道如何让孩子找到学习的乐趣吗？快来学学吧！😃

SourceText: 🎨 Playing with @fields.child_nickname is important for their development and learning in and out of school. This is true for ALL children, including those with physical and developmental disabilities.
text: 🎨 和 @fields.child_nickname 一起玩，对任何孩子的发展和学习都很重要。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🚲 Did you know that playing also helps @fields.child_nickname learn social values and social rules?
text: 🚲 玩游戏还可以帮 @fields.child_nickname 学习社会价值观和社会规则哦。👀
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🎨 Playing with your child is important for their development and learning in and out of school. This is true for ALL children, including those with physical and developmental disabilities.
text: 🎨 和孩子一起玩，对任何孩子的发展和学习都很重要。

SourceText: 🚲 Did you know that playing also helps your child learn social values and social rules?
text: 🚲 玩游戏还可以帮孩子学习社会价值观和社会规则哦。👀

SourceText: ▶️ Press play to learn 2️⃣ two ways you can make learning fun for @fields.child_nickname.
text:
如何像漫画里的妈妈一样，和孩子边玩边学？

2️⃣个育儿小妙招，让你和 @fields.child_nickname 一起寓教于乐！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: ▶️ Press play to learn 2️⃣ two ways you can make learning fun for your child.
text:
如何像漫画里的妈妈一样，和孩子边玩边学？

2️⃣个育儿小妙招，让你和孩子一起寓教于乐！

SourceText: 2️⃣ Here are 2 tips on how you can make learning playful and fun with @fields.child_nickname.
text:
如何像漫画里的妈妈一样，和孩子边玩边学？

2️⃣个育儿小妙招，让你和 @fields.child_nickname 一起寓教于乐！
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 2️⃣ Here are 2 tips on how you can make learning playful and fun with your child.
text:
如何像漫画里的妈妈一样，和孩子边玩边学？

2️⃣个育儿小妙招，让你和孩子一起寓教于乐！

SourceText: 1️⃣ GET ACTIVE
text: 1️⃣ 动起来

SourceText: ⚽ Play games!
text: ⚽ 玩游戏！

SourceText: 🌱 Creating time for @fields.child_nickname to play and have fun will make their physical and mental health better.
text: 🌱 为 @fields.child_nickname 创造休闲玩耍的时间，这有助于他们的身心健康。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: ✨ It also helps them learn and remember important facts better. Isn’t that great?
text: ✨ 这还能让他们更好地学习并记住重要的事情。一举两得！

SourceText: ⏰ If @fields.child_nickname starts to feel overwhelmed with anything in their day, help them reduce their stress by taking a pause or playing together.
text: ⏰ 如果哪天 @fields.child_nickname 觉得太累了，你可以陪着他们暂停休整一下，或跟他们一起玩耍，来帮助他们放松。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 💡 Use @fields.child_nickname’s interests in your play or exercise sessions to help them engage. Begin with something simple and then gradually make it more complex.
text: 💡 在玩耍或锻炼时，多做 @fields.child_nickname 感兴趣的事情，让他们更愿意参与。可以从简单的事情做起，然后慢慢增加难度。
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 🌱 Creating time for your child to play and have fun will make their physical and mental health better.
text: 🌱 为孩子创造休闲玩耍的时间，这有助于他们的身心健康。

SourceText: ⏰ If your child starts to feel overwhelmed with anything in their day, help them reduce their stress by taking a pause or playing together.
text: ⏰ 如果哪天孩子觉得太累了，你可以陪着他们暂停休整一下，或跟他们一起玩耍，来帮助他们放松。

SourceText: 💡 Use your child’s interests in your play or exercise sessions to help them engage. Begin with something simple and then gradually make it more complex.
text: 💡 在玩耍或锻炼时，多做孩子感兴趣的事情，让他们更愿意参与。可以从简单的事情做起，然后慢慢增加难度。

text: 2️⃣ 鼓励创造
