SourceText: In this goal, we are learning about the four steps to building a parenting budget. 💰
text: 规划育儿预算储蓄，有四个步骤。💰

SourceText: 1️⃣ The first step is identifying parenting needs and wants. 🍞🚗📱
text: 第1️⃣步：区分育儿必需品和非必需品。🍞🚗📱

SourceText: Managing how money is spent is important to ensure that parents are able to provide for our children. 💛
text: 学会制定育儿预算的好处很多。💛

SourceText: When money for parenting is tight, this can make us feel anxious, stressed, and sad. 😒😔😣
text: 可以降低家长在财务紧张时的压力和焦虑。😒😔😣

SourceText: ▶️ Press play and learn 3️⃣ three steps to start your parenting budget!
text: ▶️ 我们先看看如何区分育儿必需品和非必需品。

SourceText: Here’s an audio message about starting to build a parenting budget.
text: 以下一段音频，介绍了如何开始制定育儿预算。

SourceText: 3️⃣ Let's learn three steps to start your parenting budget!
text: 我们先看看如何区分育儿必需品和非必需品。

SourceText: 1️⃣ IDENTIFY NEEDS
text: 1️⃣ 确定必需品

SourceText: 📝 With your family, make a list of things that you cannot parent without. Things that are important for your children to survive.
text: 📝和家人一起讨论，有哪些物品是育儿中不可或缺的，对孩子健康成长有重要作用？

SourceText: ⭐ For example food🍚, medicine💊, or hand soap 🧼.
text: ⭐比如食品🍚，药物💊，或清洁用品🧼。

SourceText: 2️⃣ IDENTIFY WANTS
text: 2️⃣ 确定非必需品

SourceText: 🎁 Make a list of things that your children want. These are things that would be nice to have but not essential.
text: 🎁列出你们或孩子想要的，但不是必需的东西。

SourceText: For example the latest version of a smartphone 📱, new toy 🧸, or a new car 🚗.
text: 例如，最新款手机📱，新玩具🧸，或新款自行车🚴‍♀ 。

SourceText: 3️⃣ TALK
text: 3️⃣ 聊一聊

SourceText: 👀 People often see things in different ways.
text: 👀人们看待事物的角度常常不同。

SourceText: 📝 You may find that your family members see one thing as a parenting NEED while you see it as a parenting WANT.
text: 📝你可能发现，你和家人对于一些物品的必要性持不同意见。

SourceText: 💰 Talk with your family about why you feel differently, this will help you to understand each other and can make decisions together about what to spend money on.
text: 💰与家人讨论不同想法，可以促进相互理解，一起决定将钱花在什么地方。

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ Discuss your parenting wants and needs with your family. Do you have time to do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐

与家人讨论育儿必需品和非必需品。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: That’s great! Discussing Needs and Wants is very important for creating a successful parenting budget plan. 💚
text: 太棒了！区分必需品和非必需品，是制定育儿预算的关键步骤。💚

SourceText: That’s OK. The best place to start is by thinking about your own parenting wants and needs before speaking with other members of your family. 📝
text: 没关系。在与家人讨论之前，你可以先想想自己认为哪些是育儿必需品、哪些是非必需品。📝

SourceText: Once you feel comfortable, you can take the next step and complete step two of setting a parenting budget. ✨ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.💚
text:
想好之后，可以进行下一步：制定育儿预算。✨
💚

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the first step to parenting budgeting! 🎉 You are one step closer to achieving the badge for parenting budgeting.
text: 非常好，你已经完成了“规划育儿预算储蓄”四个步骤中的第一步！🎉你离赢得奖章又近了一步。

SourceText: 2️⃣ Today, we are learning about step 2: talking about monthly parenting expenses.
text: 第2️⃣步：讨论每月的家庭育儿开支。

SourceText: 🔑 Knowing what your family’s monthly parenting expenses are can be helpful for everyone in your family.
text: 🔑 让家人了解每月的家庭育儿开支很有益处。

SourceText: 💡 It can help them understand why money is being spent on some things and not on others.
text: 💡 这能帮助大家理解为什么要在孩子的一些方面花钱，另一些方面不要花钱。

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn step 2 of building a parenting budget.
text: ▶️ 点击“播放”，学习规划育儿预算储蓄的第二个步骤：讨论开支。

SourceText: Click 🔗 to get started!
text: 点击查看漫画，开始学习吧！

SourceText: Home activity! ⭐ It’s time to add up your monthly parenting expenses. Do you have time to do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐

是时候计算月度育儿开销啦。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: That’s great! Involving your family will help them learn how to make a parenting budget and understand how money related to parenting is spent! 💚
text: 太棒了！可以让你的家人也参与进来，帮助他们了解育儿开支，一起商量育儿预算！💚

SourceText: That’s OK. Try to make some time to do this soon. You can do this! 🌷 Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu. 💚
text:
没关系。请尽快抽点时间，来算一算你的月度育儿开支吧。🌷

加油！💚

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the second step to parenting budgeting! 🎉 You are one step closer to achieving the badge for parenting budgeting.
text: 太棒了，你已经完成了“规划育儿预算储蓄”四个步骤中的第二步！🎉你离赢得奖章又近了一步。

SourceText: 3️⃣ Today, we are reviewing step 3: making a monthly budget.
text: 下面我们来学习第3️⃣步：制定月度育儿预算。

SourceText: Balancing the money you earn with the money you need to spend on parenting is an important step in making a monthly budget. 📝
text: 制定育儿预算的关键原则是“量入为出”，也就是根据每月的收入来决定每月的花销。📝

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn step 3 of building a parenting budget.
text: ▶️ 点击“播放”，学习规划育儿预算储蓄的第三步：制定预算。

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ It’s time to get out your paper and build your monthly parenting budget. Do you have time to do it today?
text:
家庭练习！⭐

和家人一起制定你家的月度育儿预算。

你今天有时间试一试吗？

SourceText: That’s great! Consider involving your family: it’s a great skill for everyone to learn. 💚
text: 太棒了！这项技能很重要，让你的家人也参与进来吧！💚

SourceText: That’s OK. Try to do it this week. Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu. 💚
text: 没关系。请试着在这周内找个时间试一试。你可以随时在主菜单中回顾课程内容。

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the third step to parenting budgeting. 🎉 You are one step closer to achieving the badge for parenting budgeting. ⭐
text:
非常棒，你已经完成了“规划育儿预算储蓄”四个步骤中的第三步！🎉
你离赢得奖章又近了一步。⭐

SourceText: Congratulations! You have reached the final step to parenting budgeting. 💰
text: 恭喜你！你已经迈入了规划育儿预算储蓄的最后一步。💰

SourceText: 4️⃣ Today, we are reviewing the final step: make a saving plan for your children. You should be very proud of your dedication!
text:
今天，我们学习第4️⃣步：制定育儿储蓄计划。

学到这儿，你真应该为自己感到骄傲！😀

SourceText: 🌷 Making a saving plan can help you prepare for crises while also having funds for your child’s education and other things that your children may need in the future.
text: 🌷 制定育儿储蓄计划，可以为孩子未来的教育储备资金，应对不时之需。

SourceText: ✨ Even a small amount each month can make a big difference over time.
text: ✨做时间的朋友，每个月只存一点的钱，随着时间的推移就会攒下很大一笔钱。

SourceText: True or False: It’s OK to think about saving in the future if I don’t have enough now.
text: 如果我现在没钱，可以考虑以后再存。

SourceText: It may seem hard 😔 but it’s good to save some money, even if it’s not much, for an emergency or big child-related expenditure in the future. You are a super parent! 💚
text: 存钱可能不容易😔但是作为家长，有必要为将来的紧急情况、或孩子的大笔支出提前做准备。你真的很棒！💚

SourceText: {F3_MOTHER} has big hopes for her children’s futures and she is making a plan:
text: {F3_MOTHER}对孩子们的未来寄予厚望，她正在制定一个储蓄计划：

SourceText: ▶️Press play to learn 5 tips for making a savings plan for your child:
text: ▶️ 如何为孩子的发展做好财务准备？以下5️⃣招，帮你轻松搞定家庭育儿储蓄计划。

SourceText: 5️⃣ Here are five tips on how to make a savings plan for your child:
text: 如何为孩子的未来做好财务准备？以下5️⃣招，帮你轻松搞定家庭育儿储蓄计划。

SourceText: 1️⃣ WHY SAVE
text: 1️⃣ 为什么要存钱

SourceText: Decide why you want to save money. These could include:
text: 想想你存钱的原因：

SourceText: 😔Preparing for emergencies
text: 😔应对可能出现的紧急情况

SourceText: 🎁 Buying something nice for your child or do something fun as a family
text: 🎁给孩子买东西，或组织家庭活动。

SourceText: 📖 Planning for future big expenses like improvements for your child’s education
text: 📖为孩子将来的大笔开支做准备，比如教育支出。

SourceText: 2️⃣ HOW TO SAVE
text: 2️⃣ 如何存钱

SourceText: 🚩 Set a target amount that you want to save.
text: 🚩设定一个目标金额。

SourceText: 💰 Look at your monthly budget and decide how much you can save each week and each month.
text: 💰看看你每月的预算，算算你每周和每月分别可以存多少钱。

SourceText: 3️⃣ WHERE TO SAVE
text: 3️⃣ 把钱存在哪里

SourceText: Consider saving at a trusted bank to keep money safe for future use.
text: 可以把钱存到一家值得信赖的银行，保障资金安全，以备将来使用。

SourceText: 4️⃣ EMERGENCY FUNDS
text: 4️⃣ 应急基金

SourceText: ❗ If you can try and save even a tiny amount for the future or for an emergency. This can make a big difference over time.
text: ❗ 每次省出一小笔钱，存下来吧。随着时间的积累，你会攒下很大一笔钱的。

SourceText: 5️⃣ GET SUPPORT
text: 5️⃣ 获取支持

SourceText: 🌱 Your government or community groups may be giving money or other support to families in need.
text: 🌱政府或机构可能会给有需要的家庭提供帮助。

SourceText: 💛 Think about whether there are places in your community that provide support.
text: 💛想想你的社区中是否有相关支持资源？

SourceText: Home Activity! ⭐ It’s time to create your parenting savings plan. Do you have time to do it today?
text: 家庭练习！⭐你今天有时间试一试制定育儿储蓄计划吗？

SourceText: That’s great! Congratulations. 💚
text: 太棒了，恭喜！🤗💚

SourceText: Well done, you have completed the final step in making a parenting budget and have earned yourself the parenting budgeting trophy! Congratulations! ⭐
text: 太棒了，你已经完成了规划育儿预算储蓄的最后一步，并赢得了奖章！恭喜你！⭐
